item.title: OPEN CALL「Impressions COVID」Online Art Exhibition
item.description: Important Dates Submission Deadline: January 24th, 2021 Exhibition Opening: February 15th, 2021 Exhibition Portal: 「Impressions COVID」 About This Exhibit Teeming with natural disasters, domestic and international social tensions, these past few months hardly leave us with a mental break. As a student organization founded amidst the pandemic, we hope to provide a safe space for all to share their perspectives and to document the different experiences in this special time, from the US and beyond.
